forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 10C. SE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 51F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
